attributes.action: Do not ban social media for under 16s
attributes.additional_details: Don’t ban I because there is also good stuff that you can do on social media and good wins over bad
attributes.background: Do not ban social media for under 16s

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Do not ban social media for under 16s" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/757233
